pkgmetadata.longdescription:
twofing is a daemon which runs in the background and recognizes two-finger gestures performed on a touchscreen and converts them into mouse and keyboard events.
This way, such gestures can be used in almost all existing applications (even ones where you wouldnâ€™t expect it, like Wine applications) without having to modify them.
Currently contains udev bindings for the egalax touchscreen, and the Raspberry Pi (1,2,3) official 7" touchscreen.
